title: Textile, ca. 1840
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller on plain weave
dimensions:
Warp: 210 cm (82in.)
Weft: 76cm (30 in.)

description: Two scenes illustrating a Turkish theme, each containing three people. The scenes are set within a lattice of exotic foliage.
